tune.name: Muriel Johnstone's Last Summer School
tune.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
tune.content:
\relative f' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key a \major
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 a8 b |
      cis4 b16 a8. cis4 b16 a8. |
      b8. cis16 b a8. fis4 \tuplet 3/2 { e8 fis gis } |
      a8. b16 cis fis8. e cis16 b a8. |
      cis4 b b a8 b |
      \break

      cis4 b16 a8. cis4 b16 a8. |
      b8. cis16 b a8. fis4 \tuplet 3/2 { e8 fis gis } |
      a8. b16 cis fis8. e cis16 b a8. |
      cis4 b a
      \bar "||" \break

      a8 b |
      cis16 e8. e4 a8. gis16 fis e8. |
      fis4. e8 cis4 cis8 d |
      e4 e cis'8. b16 a gis8. |
      a4 gis8 a fis4 \tuplet 3/2 { e8 fis gis } |
      \break

      a8. gis16 fis e8. fis8. d16 a fis'8. |
      e8. cis16 b gis8. fis4. gis8 |
      a8. b16 cis fis8. e cis16 b a8. |
      cis4 b a
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      a2 fis:m7 | e d4 e:7 | a2 e/b | a/cis e:7 |
      a2 fis:m7 | e d4 e:7 | a2 e/b | a4/cis e:7 a

      s4 |
      cis2:m a | d a | cis:m a | d e4 e:7 |
      a2 d | cis:m d | a e/b | a4/cis e:7 a
    }
  }
>>
